title: Diarrhea and cholera surveillance for early warning and preparedness to prevent epidemics among Rohingya Myanmar nationals in Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Ashraful Islam Khan, Md. Taufiqul Islam, Nabid Anjum Tanvir, Zahid Hasan Khan, Mohammad Ashraful Amin, Md. Golam Firoj, Md. Mokibul Hassan Afrad, Yasmin Ara Begum, Abu Toha M.R.H. Bhuiyan, ASM Mainul Hasan, Tahmina Shirin, Firdausi Qadri
